Patterns

Patterns are reusable blocks of code that allow for consistent structure and styling.

Grids

Stuff about our customized grid with Neat will go here. Checkout Neat's documentation and examples to learn how to use this super-flexible system.

Flashes

Flashes are notices, error messages, etc.

This is a Notice. I might contain a caveat or a helpful tip.
Look at me! I have something important to say!
Oh Noes! Something went wrong. It's probably Brad's fault.
